message: Undid revision 524110183 by [[Special:Contributions/Escape Orbit|Escape Orbit]] ([[User talk:Escape Orbit|talk]]) His denial is on the tape and at footnote 5 on this very page you moron

Reverted 1 edit by [[Special:Contributions/Bardick|Bardick]] ([[User talk:Bardick|talk]]): Unsourced and [[WP:BLP]] violations.

Less of the "moron" thanks. These additions are unsourced, speculative commentary-style additions to a BLP. However controversial or pro-Stalin he may genuinely be, pls find sources and write in a neutral manner with due weight
